event_id.description: [string]An animation event that triggers a footstep effect.

node.description: [string]The node in the unit to play the footstep from.

shake_range.description: The range by which the shake is felt.

shake_falloff_range.description: The range by which the shakes is no longer felt.

owner_shake_asset.description: [camera_shake]The camera shake to play for the owner.

owner_shake_range.description: The range by which the shake is felt for the owner.

owner_shake_falloff_range.description: The range by which the shakes is no longer felt for the owner.
